name: @social-manager-tools/igbot
description: Social Manager Tools: Instagram Bot API
author: Patryk Rzucid≈Ço [@ptkdev] <support@ptkdev.io> (https://ptk.dev)

scripts.git-set-upstream: git remote add upstream git@github.com:social-manager-tools/socialmanagertools-igbot.git && git fetch upstream
scripts.git-pull-upstream: git pull upstream master && git pull upstream beta && git pull upstream nightly
scripts.git-switch-master: git checkout master && git submodule update --init --recursive && git pull --recursive
scripts.git-switch-beta: git checkout beta && git submodule update --init --recursive && git pull --recursive
scripts.git-switch-nightly: git checkout nightly && git submodule update --init --recursive && git pull --recursive
scripts.git-ignore-reset: git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m "[Fix] Removing all files in .gitignore"
scripts.git-postinstall: npm run docs-init && npm run git-set-upstream && git-switch-nightly
scripts.npm-publish-master-latest: git checkout master && json -I -f package.json -e 'this.dependencies.puppeteer="latest"' && npm publish
scripts.npm-publish-beta: git checkout beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.npm-publish-nightly: git checkout nightly && npm publish --tag nightly
scripts.devpostinstall: npm run docs-init && npm run contributors-generate && npm run docker-fix

hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run contributors-generate
